participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and hardworking, Emily enjoys the open fields and has a deep connection with nature.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake loves skateboarding and spending time with his friends.
participant_2.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

content.text: Yes! It is my father's farm.
